articles.title: Kim Kwan Jin Will Never Escape S. Koreans' Punishment: CPRK
articles.content:
Kim Kwan Jin Will Never Escape S. Koreans' Punishment: CPRK
 Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) Saturday made public information bulletin No. 1072 denouncing Chongwadae of south Korea for employing all sorts of sleight of hand to calm down the resentment of the people, far from punishing Kim Kwan Jin who is chiefly to blame for the killings of puppet army soldiers.
					 Opposition parties and people from all walks of life in south Korea are strongly demanding the severe punishment of traitor Kim Kwan Jin, the then minister of Defense and incumbent chief of the security office of Chongwadae, as he was chiefly to blame for the hideous human rights abuses within the puppet army and the killing of private first class Yun, in particular.
					
					 As soon as he held the post of the minister in 2010, Kim undisguisedly fostered bestial torture and harsh actions and violence, crying out for establishing military discipline within the puppet army in order to turn it into combat forces capable of prevailing over the north.
					
					 Openly blustering "violence is the basic means for controlling army", gangster Kim reduced his military inferiors and soldiers to maniacs keen on confrontation with fellow countrymen and infused into them extreme misanthropy and brutality. He thus became the arch criminal who made such human rights abuses as the killing of Yun commonplace in the army. 
					
					 The big disasters in the puppet army which shocked south Korea, ranging from the shooting spree in the puppet marine corps in 2011 to the case of the death of private first class Yun, occurred when Kim Kwan Jin was holding the post of defense minister.
					
					 It is quite natural for various circles of south Korea to hold Kim responsible for the disasters.
					
					 The present regime of south Korea is the one abusing human rights and a man-killing one as it appointed such murderer as Kim as  chief of the security office of Chongwadae and is protecting him under her wings.
					
					 If Chongwadae persistently patronizes Kim as now, it will have its image tarnished, further foster hideous human rights abuses in the puppet army and put greater spurs to the fascistization of south Korean society. 
					
					 People's mindset represents the will of Heaven and those going against the mindset are bound to be punished by Heaven.

articles.title: Delegation of Architects Union of Korea Back Home
articles.content:
Delegation of Architects Union of Korea Back Home
 Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Architects Union of Korea led by Vice-Chairman Sim Yong Hak returned home Saturday after taking part in the 26th general meeting of the International Union of Architects held in Durban, South Africa.

articles.title: Russia-Cross Korean Peninsula Car Riding Group Passes through Kaesong
articles.content:
Russia-Cross Korean Peninsula Car Riding Group Passes through Kaesong
 Kaesong, August 16 (KCNA) -- The Russia-cross Korean Peninsula car riding group headed by Kim Chil Song, first vice-chairman of the International United Confederation of Koreans and chairman of the United Confederation of Koreans in Russia, passed through Kaesong on Saturday. The group is taking part in the "Paektu-Halla car riding for supporting the peace and reunification of the Korean peninsula".
					 A ceremony of seeing off the group took place.
					
					 Present there were Kim Song Gun, secretary general of the Kaesong City People's Committee, Ri Song Gon, deputy director of the Agency of Overseas Korean Affairs, officials concerned and members of the car riding group.
					
					 Speeches were made there.
					
					 Speakers said that the group demonstrated at home and abroad the will of the Korean nation for national reunification while passing through different areas of the DPRK with ardent desire to contribute to peace and reunification of the Korean peninsula.
					
					 They stressed that they would make all efforts for the national reconciliation and unity and national reunification in the future, too.
					
					 The group crossed the Military Demarcation Line.
					
					 Prior to it, the group visited Panmunjom.
					
					 The members of the group looked round the monument inscribed with President Kim Il Sung's signature conveying the noble intention of loving the country and nation by the President who left his last sign on the historic document for putting an end to the tragedy of national division and achieving the cause of national reunification.
					
					 They went round the meeting room of armistice talks, the hall where the armistice agreement was signed and Phanmun Pavilion.
					
					 They also went round the Koryo Museum.

articles.title: Delegation of Angola Doctor Association Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Delegation of Angola Doctor Association Visits Mangyongdae
 Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- A delegation of the Angola Doctor Association led by President Carlos Alberto Pinto de Sousa visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					 Being briefed on the revolutionary life of the President, they looked round historic relics preserved at the old home in Mangyongdae.
					
					 They also went round revolutionary relics on Mangyong Hill.
					
					 The head of the delegation said that the delegation was deeply impressed to visit the birthplace of the President in Mangyongdae. 
					
					 After embarking on the road of the revolution in his early years, he defeated the Japanese imperialists and achieved the liberation of Korea.
					
					 The head of the delegation renewed his will to widely introduce the President's greatness back home.
					
					 Meanwhile, the delegation visited the Breast Tumour Institute of the Pyongyang Maternity Hospital, the Okryu Children's Hospital, the Ryugyong Dental Hospital, etc.

articles.title: Natural Macrobiotic Foodstuffs
articles.content:
Natural Macrobiotic Foodstuffs
 Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- "Hwawon"-trademarked macrobiotic foodstuffs are enjoying popularity among foreigners touring Mt. Kumgang in the DPRK.
					 The General Company of the Development of Special Zone for International Tour of Mt. Kumgang makes over 50 kinds of foodstuffs with honey, edible herbs and wild fruits like Ganoderma lucidum, bracken and Lycium chinense, which are abundant in Mt. Kumgang.
					
					 Among those foodstuffs are processed honey and royal jelly.
					
					 The foodstuffs are considered to be efficacious against circulatory diseases, diabetes, cancer, etc.
					
					 The state's GMP authentication was awarded to the foodstuffs, which are highly competitive in foreign markets.
					
					 Foreigners can easily purchase those foodstuffs in scenic spots of Mt. Kumgang.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung, Genuine Internationalist
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung, Genuine Internationalist
 Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung had made big contributions to the cause of global independence in his lifetime.
					 During the anti-Japanese revolutionary war, he commanded many battles to defend the Soviet Union with arms. Under his leadership, the Korean People's Revolutionary Army had harassed the rear of the Japanese imperialists through powerful military and political offensives to check and frustrate their invasion upon the Soviet Union.
					
					 In the 1960s, he afforded sincere support to the Cuban people in their struggle to defend the country from the U.S. imperialists' aggression after the collapse of the pro-American dictatorship in Cuba. The DPRK's assistance to Cuba had continued whenever the latter suffered difficulties.
					
					 During the Vietnamese war, Kim Il Sung rendered unsparing military aids to the Vietnamese people in their anti-U.S. war of resistance for national salvation. At that time, Ho Chi Minh, the then Vietnamese president, praised Kim Il Sung as the savior of destiny and his real brother for heartily assisting Vietnam.
					
					 Kim Il Sung had always paid deep attention to the struggle of developing countries like Egypt, Mozambique, Zimbabwe, Nicaragua and Tanzania to strengthen national power and build a new society, giving sincere aids and support to them.
					
					 The great feats performed by Kim Il Sung for global independence will be remembered forever by the world progressives.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung, Great National Liberator
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung, Great National Liberator
 Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- The anti-Japanese revolutionary war led by President Kim Il Sung ended in the victory of the Korean nation with the unconditional capitulation of the Japanese imperialists.
					 Kim Il Sung was the great national liberator who had accomplished the historic cause of national liberation.
					
					 After embarking upon the road of revolution in his early teens, Kim Il Sung formed the Down-with-Imperialism Union, a genuine new-type revolutionary organization and the first of its kind in Korea, on October 17, 1926.
					
					 The formation of the DIU was a historic declaration heralding the start of the Korean revolution.
					
					 Later, he had formed many revolutionary organizations like the Saenal Children's Union, Young Communist League of Korea, Peasants' Union, Anti-Japanese Trade Union and Anti-Japanese Women's Association, rallying the people of all social standings closely behind those organizations.
					
					  In his report "The Path of the Korean Revolution" made at the Kalun Meeting (June 30, 1930-July 2, 1930), he indicated the revolutionary theory and principle of Juche idea that Koreans are responsible for the Korean revolution and the Korean revolution should be carried on by the Korean people in keeping with the specific conditions of the country.
					
					  The creation of the Juche idea made it possible to give a scientific definition to the character and mission of the Korean revolution and its motive force and main target. 
					
					 Kim Il Sung also set forth the revolutionary lines and policies including the line of anti-Japanese armed struggle.
					
					 According to the lines and policies, the Society for Rallying Comrades, the first party organization, and the Korean Revolutionary Army, the first armed organization, were formed in July 1930.
					
					 At the meeting held in Mingyuegou, China in December 1931, he advanced the idea of waging an armed struggle against the Japanese imperialists through guerrilla warfare.
					
					 And he found the Anti-Japanese People's Guerrilla Army, the first Juche-type revolutionary armed forces of the Korean nation, on April 25, 1932.
					
					 Under his wise leadership, the anti-Japanese guerrilla army had grown stronger, winning victories in all battles against the enemies.
					
					 During the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, Kim Il Sung had paid deep attention to rallying all Koreans into a single force under the banner of national liberation.
					
					 He found the Association for the Restoration of the Fatherland, a permanent organization for anti-Japanese national united front, at a meeting held in Tongjiang, Fusong County, China in May 1936.
					
					 The association had embraced broad masses of people including workers, peasants, intellectuals, businessmen and religionists, encouraging them to take active part in the struggle against the Japanese imperialists and positively support the Korean People's Revolutionary Army (KPRA).
					
					 On August 9, 1945, Kim Il Sung issued an order to launch the final attack on the Japanese imperialists.
					
					 According to his order, the KPRA advanced towards the homeland, annihilating the Japanese imperialist aggression troops.
					
					 On August 15, 1945, Japan announced its unconditional capitulation. And the Korean nation accomplished the historic cause of national liberation under the leadership of Kim Il Sung.
					
					 To hand down to posterity the undying feats Kim Il Sung performed for achieving the national liberation, the Arch of Triumph was built in Pyongyang in April 1982.

articles.title: Tour of Revolutionary Battle Sites in Area of Mt. Paektu Goes on
articles.content:
Tour of Revolutionary Battle Sites in Area of Mt. Paektu Goes on
 Hyesan, August 16 (KCNA) -- Officials of the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea and information workers of its primary organizations across the country made a study tour of revolutionary battle sites in the area of Mt. Paektu from August 8 to 16 to mark the 54th anniversary of leader Kim Jong Il's start of Songun revolutionary leadership.
					 They laid floral baskets and bouquets before the statues of President Kim Il Sung at the Monument to the Victorious Battle of Pochonbo, Pochonbo Revolutionary Battle Site, Chongbong Bivouac, shore of Lake Samji and the Monument to the Victorious Battle in Musan Area and the mosaic depicting the images of the three commanders of Mt. Paektu at the Paektusan secret camp and paid tribute to them.
					
					 They looked round the command post of the battle, post office, sub-county office, the police post of the Japanese imperialists and others at the Pochonbo Revolutionary Battle Site before visiting the Spring Site in Poso-ri, Junghung Tableland, Rimyongsu Revolutionary Site, Chongbong Bivouac and Konchang Bivouac.
					
					 They toured the Paektu Hall, Chonji Health Complex, Pegaebong Noodle House, et.c in Samjiyon township.
					
					 They visited the Monument to the Victorious Battle in Musan Area and went round the Mupho Angling Site, Kanbaeksan Secret Camp and others before climbing Mt. Paektu, the holy mountain of the revolution. Commanding a bird's-eye view of Lake Chon and thick forest of Mt. Paektu, they hardened their will to carry the revolutionary cause of Juche to completion under the guidance of Marshal Kim Jong Un.
					
					 They visited the Paektusan Secret Camp and held an oath-taking meeting before Kim Jong Il's birthplace in the Paektusan Secret Camp.
					
					 At the end of the meeting they looked round historic relics preserved there with much care, being briefed on the fact that Kim Jong Il was born as the Shining Star of Mt. Paektu and grew up, hearing gunfire during the great anti-Japanese war.
					
					 During the study tour they held anti-Japanese guerrilla-style information and agitation contest, question-and-answer study contest and other colorful political and cultural events.

articles.title: US Hostile Policy toward DPRK Bound to Go Bust: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
US Hostile Policy toward DPRK Bound to Go Bust: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- The U.S. policy toward the DPRK is becoming a topic of discussion in the political arena.
					 U.S. Congress is growing increasingly discontent with the U.S. policy toward the DPRK, querying "How long the strategic patience will last?", "Should we be patient for hundreds, thousands of years?" and "Should we be patient for good?"
					
					 Even the U.S. institutions for policy studies are becoming increasingly critical of its policies, noting that the U.S. policy has neither strategy nor clear tactical goal and they feel frustration in Obama's policy toward the DPRK.
					
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday observes in a commentary:
					
					 Pretending to know about world politics better than any others, the U.S. is apt to advise other legitimate sovereign states, behaving as if it were an international judge. However, it is now arguing pros and cons as regards its foreign policy, thus becoming a laughing stock of world people. 
					
					 The U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK is bound to go bust as it is anachronistic and unrealistic and a manifestation of ignorance.
					
					 If the politicians of the U.S. do not give up their inveterate repugnance and hostile policy toward towards the DPRK, they will certainly make a political mistake.
					
					 It is a tragedy that the U.S. is still locked in its family quarrel, failing to know what it should do, though it is the country which compelled the DPRK to have access to nukes.
					
					 The DPRK will do what it should do, regardless of whether the U.S. politicians waste their time, playing a wordplay, pursuant to their ridiculous hostile policy toward the former.
					
					 The more absent-mindedly the U.S. waste its time, the more elite the DPRK's powerful nuclear deterrent will become.
					
					 The U.S. would be well advised to make a policy switchover, though belatedly, awake from its anachronistic daydream of inviting shame and ruin.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Terms S. Korea Complete Colony of US
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Terms S. Korea Complete Colony of US
 Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- South Korea is a total colony of the U.S. because there is the "regime" there but it lacks any real power, there is an "army" but it has no right to command operations and it has neither its own economy nor culture. Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 It is not the people or the "government" but the White House that has the right to decide on the domestic and foreign policies in south Korea. 
					
					 It is open secrecy that the U.S. decides who should become "president".
					
					 The "presidential" election in south Korea is, in fact, nothing but a deceptive farce to cook up a pro-U.S. puppet regime.
					
					 The U.S. holds "summit talks" with south Korea, but it is, in fact, aimed to justify its colonial domination and impose aggressive and predatory demands upon south Korea.
					
					 The "policy toward the north" touted by the south Korean puppet forces is oriented to meeting the U.S. interests and demands.
					
					 The "confidence-building process" touted by the present chief executive is no more than a copy of the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK the keynote of which is to force it to dismantle its nukes.
					
					 The south Korean puppet army is the only one in the world whose prerogative of supreme command is in the hands of outside forces.
					
					 There are many overseas military bases of the U.S. on the earth, but no countries except for south Korea cover even the expenses for the presence of U.S. forces and those for the transfer of their base.
					
					 South Korea is completely dependent on outside forces politically, militarily and economically.
					
					It is quite natural for the south Korean people to turn out in the struggle to terminate the U.S. colonial domination and the puppet group's misrule against the people, under uplifted slogan of independence, democracy and reunification, the article concludes.

articles.title: Yun Pyong Se Accused of Imploring for Outsiders' Cooperation in Anti-DPRK Campaign
articles.content:
Yun Pyong Se Accused of Imploring for Outsiders' Cooperation in Anti-DPRK Campaign
 Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- Yun Pyong Se, puppet minister of Foreign Affairs of south Korea, begged the U.S., Japan and other countries for cooperation in the anti-DPRK campaign during the recent ASEAN Regional Forum. He described the nuclear weapons and missiles of the DPRK as "threat" and "blatant challenge" to peace and stability and blustered that the international community should "send a clearer and strong message" to it. He "urged the north to make a decision for dismantling its nukes" and "called on the international community to cooperate in the campaign against it," creating the wrong impression that peace and stability on the Korean peninsula and in the region are threatened by "provocations from the north".
					 Commenting on this, Rodong Sinmun Saturday notes that this is a revelation of an inveterate bad habit to cooperate with foreign forces and do harm to fellow countrymen with their help.
					
					 It is the basic method of the south Korean puppet forces totally dependent on foreign forces to pursue their policy of confrontation with the DPRK through cooperation with foreign forces. 
					
					 Great irony is that failing to mind their own business, they are imploring other countries to help them while slandering their fellow countrymen in international arena.
					
					 Their frantic diplomacy in pursuance of cooperation in the confrontation with the DPRK in collusion with foreign forces would get them nowhere. They had better stop such foolish diplomacy.
					
					 Their provocative moves would only harden the will of all service personnel and people of the DPRK to resolutely meet their reckless challenges with bolstered nuclear deterrence for self-defence.
					
					 The persistent moves of the U.S. and south Korean puppet forces to ignite a nuclear war against the DPRK will only compel the DPRK to bolster up its nuclear deterrence for self-defence.

articles.title: Japan's Past Crimes Can Never Be Written off: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Japan's Past Crimes Can Never Be Written off: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- The history of the past crimes committed by Japan can neither be written off nor be covered.
					 Rodong Sinmun Saturday says this in an article, and goes on:
					
					 Japan committed hideous crimes against the Korean people in the past.
					
					 The Japanese imperialists forcibly drafted and abducted millions of Koreans and used them as cannon fodder in the war and drove them into slave labor sites like beasts of burden, brutally killed more than one million Koreans and forced 200 000 Korean women into sexual slavery.
					
					 The forcible drafting and abduction committed by the Japanese imperialists were state-organized bestial atrocities. They were reminiscent of "slave hunt" in the medieval period in terms of their scale, means and methods involved.
					
					 They impudently worked hard to deprive the Koreans of their mother tongue and names and made no scruple of vandalizing and looting a lot of precious cultural treasures at random.
					
					 They committed too many crimes to enumerate.
					
					 Perpetrators of crimes should repent of them and try hard to redress them. This is the requirement of the international community and the trend of the times.

articles.title: Institution of Special Law on Probing Truth about Ferry Sewol Disaster Demanded
articles.content:
Institution of Special Law on Probing Truth about Ferry Sewol Disaster Demanded in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Measure Committee of Bereaved Families of Ordinary Victims of Ferry Sewol Disaster held a press conference outside the building of the puppet National Assembly in Seoul on August 12 at which it demanded the institution of a special law for probing the  truth about the disaster, according to KBS of south Korea.
					 The organization said that the political camp should take a proper attitude toward the solution to the issue from the stand of sincerely thinking about the victims.
					
					 It demanded the NA institute a special law at an early date to probe the truth about the disaster and hold those responsible for it.

articles.title: Protest Strike Staged in S. Korea
articles.content:
Protest Strike Staged in S. Korea
 Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- The April 16 people's sit-in strike was staged at Kwanghwamun plaza in Seoul on August 12 to demand the probe into the truth about the ferry Sewol disaster and punishment of those responsible for it, according to Chamsesang, an internet paper of south Korea.
					 Present there were workers, university professors, religionists, lawyers, university students, high school students, bereaved families of Ryongsan disaster and opposition party officials, 416 in all.
					
					 A press conference was held that day.
					
					 Then a press release was read out.
					
					 It said that they would stage actions together with bereaved families at Kwanghwamun plaza till the day when a special law with the independent rights to investigate and indict those responsible for the disaster is instituted.
					
					 It demanded the "National Assembly" immediately come out for renegotiations and the "government" make a decision to institute a special law. 
					
					 It noted that they would stage a people's strike till August 16, hold demonstrations and candlelight rallies, a 10 million-people signature campaign and other actions in different parts of Seoul in demand of the institution of a special law on probing the truth about the disaster.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung's Exploits for Korea's Liberation Praised Abroad
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung's Exploits for Korea's Liberation Praised Abroad
 Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- A Romanian political party and Peruvian organization posted articles on their websites on August 8 and 11 on the occasion of the 69th anniversary of Korea's liberation.
					 The Socialist Party of Romania said in an article titled "Day of Korea's liberation" on its website "Juche Idea":
					
					 The Korean nation was freed from the Japanese imperialists' colonial slavery on August 15, 1945.
					
					 President Kim Il Sung, founder of socialist Korea, achieved the historical cause of the country's liberation with his Songun leadership.
					
					 The exploits the President performed for Korea's liberation will go down in the human history of the anti-imperialist national liberation struggle.
					
					 The revolutionary cause of Juche pioneered by the President is being successfully carried to completion by supreme leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Only victory will always be in store for the Korean people advancing, united close around the great leader.
					
					 The Peruvian-Korean Institute of Culture and Friendship in an article titled "Korea's liberation, turning point of history" highly praised the immortal exploits the President performed by bringing about the historical change in carving out the destiny of the country and its  people by defeating the Japanese imperialists and liberating the country.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Songun Leadership Feats Lauded by Bulgarian Political Figure
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Songun Leadership Feats Lauded by Bulgarian Political Figure
 Pyongyang, August 16 (KCNA) -- Atanas Ivanov, honorary chairman of the Bulgarian Communists Union, issued a statement on Aug. 10 on the occasion of the Day of Songun (Aug. 25).
					 The statement:
					
					 The august name of leader Kim Jong Il will shine forever along with the Songun leadership.
					
					 It is because Songun comprehensively reflects his political idea and leadership mode for socialism and independence.
					
					 He applied original Songun politics to all fields on the basis of a scientific insight into the situation which prevailed at the grim period when socialism collapsed in various countries in the 1990s due to the perfidy of modern revisionists and the U.S.-led imperialist allied forces who desperately worked to stifle socialist Korea.
					
					 He trained the Korean People's Army to be an invincible army under the uplifted banner of Songun and remarkably bolstered up the national power.
					
					 The DPRK met the challenge of the imperialist allied forces by dint of ideological might and strong military muscle.
					
					 Thanks to his Songun revolutionary leadership, the national defence capability grew stronger and many monumental edifices sprang up in the DPRK. 
					
					 It was the greatest of his feats that he met the challenges of the U.S. imperialists and their allied forces and defended socialism.
					
					 He is deeply revered by the Korean people and the world progressive peoples for his shining Songun leadership feats.
					
					 We pay highest tribute to him on the occasion of the 54th anniversary of his start of Songun revolutionary leadership.

articles.title: Tienen lugar conversaciones entre cancilleres de RPDC y Singapur
articles.content:
Tienen lugar conversaciones entre cancilleres de RPDC y Singapur
Pyongyang, 16 de agosto (ACNC) -- Tuvieron lugar el dia 14 en la sede de la cancilleria de Singapur las conversaciones entre el ministro de Relaciones Exteriores de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea Ri Su Yong, quien preside la delegacion gubernamental, de visita en ese pais asiatico, y el ministro de Relaciones Exteriores y de Justicia de Singapur, K Shanmugam.
					Estuvieron presentes por la parte coreana los miembros de la delegacion, el embajador y un miembro de la sede diplomatica coreana en Singapur, y por la singapurense el secretario permanente y el director general para Nordeste Asiatico del MINREX y otros funcionarios. 
					
					En la ocasion ambas partes discutieron los temas para ampliar y desarrollar mas las relaciones bilaterales. 
					
					El mismo dia, Ri Su Yong departio con el alto ministro honorario y el ministro de Comercio Exterior e Industria de Singapur.

articles.title: CRPP aboga por castigar a Kim Kwan Jin, autor de casos de asesinato
articles.content:
CRPP aboga por castigar a Kim Kwan Jin, autor de casos de asesinato
Pyongyang, 16 de agosto (ACNC) -- El secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) publico el dia 16 la informacion no. 1072 en relacion con que Chongwadae (casa azul) defrauda por proteger a Kim Kwan Jin, autor de los casos de asesinato en el ejercito titere surcoreano y calmar la indignacion de la opinion publica por estos casos.
					 Segun la informacion, en la actualidad los partidos opositores y distintos estratos del Sur de Corea demandan fuertemente a castigar duramente al traidor Kim Kwan Jin, jefe de la Oficina de Seguridad de Chongwadae y ex ministro de Defensa Nacional, autor de la cruel barbaridad de violacion de derechos humanos ocurrida en el ejercito titere y especialmente del caso de asesinato al soldado bisono de apellido Yun.
					
					 Kim Kwan Jin, tan pronto como ocupara el cargo del ministro de Defensa Nacional en 2010, dijo que "se debe establecer la disciplina militar para convertir el ejercito en el de tipo combativo capaz de vencer al Norte" y vino fomentando abiertamente el castigo disciplinario bestial y la violencia.
					
					 El gangster Kim es autor que convirtio en maniacos de confrontacion fratricida a los lacayos de la capa militar y a los soldados disparateando abiertamente que "la violencia es el medio principal para mantener el ejercito" e hizo que los actos de violacion de DDHH como el caso de asesinato al soldado Yun se hicieran los casos usuales en el ejercito titere adiestrando a los uniformaos con la atroz idea misantropica y las atrocidades.
					
					  Los incidentes de gran tamano en el ejercito titere que dieron gran sensacion en el territorio surcoreano desde el caso de disparo de fusil en la infanteria de marina en 2011 hasta el caso de Yun arriba mencionado, fueron cometidos cuando el traidor Kwan Jin ocupaba el cargo del ministro de Defensa Nacional.
					
					  Por eso es muy natural que distintos estratos del Sur de Corea impongan la responsabilidad a Kim Kwan Jin.
					
					  El actual "poder" que designo a este asesino como jefe de la Oficina de Seguridad de Chongwadae y lo protege, es el "poder de eliminacion de DDHH" y "poder de asesinato".
					
					 Si Chongwadae sigue protegiendo como ahora al traidor Kim, sera manchada continuamente su imagen y ademas se protegera y se fomentara cada dia mas la cruel violacion de DDHH en el ejercito titere y se profundizara la fascistizacion de la sociedad surcoreana.
					
					  Quien da espalda a la opinion publica no podra evitar el castigo divino.

articles.title: Portavoz de CCM aboga por liquidacion del pasado de Japon
articles.content:
Portavoz de CCM aboga por liquidacion del pasado de Japon
Pyongyang, 16 de agosto (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Comite Coreano por Medidas (CCM) sobre el Problema de ex Esclavas Sexuales para el Ejercito Japones y Victimas de Reclutamiento Forzoso, en su declaracion fechada 15, revelo que Japon no liquida hasta hoy que pasa mas de medio siglo despues de su derrota los crimenes cometidos contra Corea y el pueblo coreano, y continuo:
					Al aplicar durante 69 anos pasados la politica hostil sobre la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, pais mas danado por el imperialismo japones, las autoridades japonesas han venido eludiendo su responsabilidad sobre la liquidacion del pasado persiguiendo el aislamiento y el aplastamiento internacionales a ella y reprimiendo a la Chongryon (Asociacion General de Coreanos Residentes en Japon) y los coreanos residentes en su pais.
					
					Liquidar correctamente la historia llena de crimenes perpetrados durante la ocupacion ilegal sobre Corea es la obligacion de Japon asumida por la ley internacional y la responsabilidad estatal a ser cumplida merecidamente.
					
					Ahora, se reafirman por doquier del mundo los crimenes cometidos en el pasado por el pais isleno y resuenan de continuo las voces de demanda de cuestionar la erronea concepcion de historia y la actitud sobre el pasado de Japon.
					
					Su causa reside en que las autoridades japonesas no reflexionan sinceramente sus crimenes antieticos del pasado incluyendo el crimen de esclavitud sexual y los justifican negando la verdad de la historia.
					
					Solo cuando Japon ejecute el deber y la responsabilidad legales y morales en cuanto a la liquidacion del pasado, sera un digno "Estado normal" ante la sociedad internacional.
					
					El proximo ano se celebrara el 70o aniversario de la derrota del imperialismo japones.
					
					Antes de pasar 70 anos, el pais isleno debera contribuir a promover la verdadera reconciliacion con la sociedad internacional y establecer en esta region las relaciones internacionales mas estables y solidas al liquidar su deuda politica, moral e historica  contraida ante el pueblo coreano y los demas asiaticos.

articles.title: Firmado protocolo de V reunion de grupo conjunto de trabajo entre RPDC y FR
articles.content:
Firmado protocolo de V reunion de grupo conjunto de trabajo entre RPDC y FR
Pyongyang, 16 de agosto (ACNC) -- Quedo rubricado el dia 15 en esta capital el protocolo de V reunion del grupo conjunto de trabajo entre los gobiernos de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea y la Federacion Rusa para resolver los problemas referentes a la ejecucion del convenio sobre las actividades de trabajo provisional de los ciudadanos de un Estado en el territorio de otro Estado.
					En la ceremonia de firmas participaron el viceministro de Relaciones Economicas con el Exterior, Ri Kwang Gun y otros funcionarios coreanos, asi como los miembros de la delegacion del Buro de Emigracion Federal de Rusia encabezada por el subdirector Anatoli Kuznetsov y el consejero de la embajada rusa en Corea, Pavel Leshakov. 
					
					Ri Kwang Gun y Anatoli Kuznetsov firmaron el documento.
